verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
By the sky full of constellations.
And by the Promised Day.
And by the witness and the witnessed.
Destroyed were the People of the Trench.
The fire supplied with fuel.
While they sat around it.

verses.verseString: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.verseStringB: And were witnessing what they were doing to the believers.

verses.verseString: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَنْ يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.verseStringB: They took vengeance on them only because they believed in Allah the Almighty, the Praised.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.verseStringB: He to Whom belongs sovereignty over the heavens and the earth. And Allah is witness over everything.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.verseStringB: Those who persecute believing men and believing women, then do not repent: for them is the punishment of Hell, and for them is the punishment of Burning.

verses.verseString: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.verseStringB: Those who believe and do righteous deeds will have Gardens beneath which rivers flow: that is the supreme triumph.
The onslaught of your Lord is severe.
It is He who begins and repeats.
And He is the Forgiving, the Loving.
Owner of the Glorious Throne.
Doer of whatever He wills.
Has the story of the legions reached you?
Of Pharaoh and Thamood?
In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.
But Allah encloses them from beyond.
In fact, it is a Glorious Quran.
In a Preserved Tablet.
